wf_workflow_version.name: Reset password
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

wf_activity.name: Check if security code is for new user registration

sys_variable_value.value: type=registration^EQ
type=registration^EQ

activity.display_value: Check if security code is for new user registration
Check if security code is for new user registration

sys_variable_value.value: active=false^EQ
active=false^EQ

[Portal] Please reset your password

We heard that you lost your ADAS Portal password. Sorry about that!
But don't worry! You can use the following link within the next day to reset your password:
http://10.91.84.26/SetPassword?userName=${login}&secCode=${security_code}
If you don't use this link within 24 hours, it will expire. To get a new password reset link, visit:
http://10.91.84.26/username
Thanks, Your friends at ADAS Portal

If you don't use this link within 24 hours, it will expire. To get a new password reset link, visit:

Thanks, Your friends at ADAS Portal
